channel.title: Code Translation on Andy Bulka

item.title: Python to RPN
item.description: A Python to HP42S RPN converter website www.pyrpn.atug.com Allows you to program your old vintage HP Calculator in Python! See also my blog post How I used the Python AST capabilities to build a Python to Rpn converter. You write code in a high level structured language (which happens to be Python 3 syntax), hit a button and RPN is generated. You then paste the RPN into Free42 or transfer it to your DM42 (by creating a raw) - and it runs.
